name: Groovy Beat Shooter
description: Groovy Beat Shooter combines the Rhythm and Shoot 'Em Up game genres for an experience that can only be enhanced by vibes of Disco-infused 70's futurism. Get buckled up into your wood-paneled space-sedan and get ready for a groovy ride...in space! This game was made for the Ludum Dare Jam 41 event. https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/groovy-beat-shooter-1
